channel.title: [508] How do I make it so you start with all 99 stats? [508]
channel.description: How can I make it so that you start out with all 99 stats? btw, im using a 508..

item.title: [508] How do I make it so you start with all 99 stats? [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“00rYn00, post:4, topic:232683”]yeah I know… I said that p.skill was wrong… lol
but I found it and it should be
p.skillLvl[SKILLNUMBER] = 99;
sorry bout that[/quote]

Its ok, ill try it now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2008, 06:05:07 pm[/size][hr]are the
SKILLNUMBER

Are they the same as 317’s?

Read full topic

item.source: [508] How do I make it so you start with all 99 stats? [508]

item.title: [508] How do I make it so you start with all 99 stats? [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“00rYn00, post:2, topic:232683”]in login search for

Engine.fileManager.appendData(
                    "characters/ips/" + p.username + ".txt",
                    "[" + Server.socketListener.getAddress(p.socket.socket)
                    + "]: successful login.");
            p.frames.setWelcome(p);
            p.frames.setInterfaces(p);
            p.frames.setConfigs(p);
            for (int i = 0; i < p.skillLvl.length; i++) {
                p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, i);
            }
            p.frames.setItems(p, 149, 0, 93, p.items, p.itemsN);
            p.frames.setItems(p, 387, 28, 93, p.equipment, p.equipmentN);
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to MimzScape, Type ::help for the help menu.");
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=1><col=0000FF> Welcome to MimzScape");
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=1><col=0000FF> Enjoy the server");
            p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "null", 1);
            p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Trade", 2);
            p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Follow", 3);
            p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, p.autoRetaliate);
            p.frames.setConfig(p, 43, p.attackStyle);
            p.playerWeapon.setWeapon();
            p.calculateEquipmentBonus();
            p.online = true;
            p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
            p.updateReq = true;
            p.runEnergyUpdateReq = true;
            p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
        }
    }

and add in the
p.skill[SKILL NUMBER] = 99;
(I’m not sure if that’s the correct variable or not though for p.skill… but I know it’s close)[/quote]

.\palidino76\rs2\io\Login.java:200: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skill
location: class palidino76.rs2.players.Player
p.skill[1] = 99;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Help?

Read full topic
item.source: [508] How do I make it so you start with all 99 stats? [508]

item.title: [508] How do I make it so you start with all 99 stats? [508]
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

in login search for

Engine.fileManager.appendData(
                    "characters/ips/" + p.username + ".txt",
                    "[" + Server.socketListener.getAddress(p.socket.socket)
                    + "]: successful login.");
            p.frames.setWelcome(p);
            p.frames.setInterfaces(p);
            p.frames.setConfigs(p);
            for (int i = 0; i < p.skillLvl.length; i++) {
                p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, i);
            }
            p.frames.setItems(p, 149, 0, 93, p.items, p.itemsN);
            p.frames.setItems(p, 387, 28, 93, p.equipment, p.equipmentN);
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Welcome to MimzScape, Type ::help for the help menu.");
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=1><col=0000FF> Welcome to MimzScape");
            p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=1><col=0000FF> Enjoy the server");
            p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "null", 1);
            p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Trade", 2);
            p.frames.setPlayerOption(p, "Follow", 3);
            p.frames.setConfig(p, 172, p.autoRetaliate);
            p.frames.setConfig(p, 43, p.attackStyle);
            p.playerWeapon.setWeapon();
            p.calculateEquipmentBonus();
            p.online = true;
            p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
            p.updateReq = true;
            p.runEnergyUpdateReq = true;
            p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
        }
    }

and add in the
p.skill[SKILL NUMBER] = 99;
(I’m not sure if that’s the correct variable or not though for p.skill… but I know it’s close)

Read full topic
